title: KaggleDays SF: 4. Amazon - End to End
description: End to end solutionUsing original features and 2-nd level interactions (pairs) this solution shows a pipeline which gets you to top 20 position on private and public LB. In this solution we are building 2 datasets and train 2 models. The final submission is an averages of these 2 models.
